author: otaviolima
title: CARDANO TV (24hs Live) Corporate TV
description: Where to follow news and video content in DIGITAL ONLINE TV format, with a 24-hour schedule, exclusively dedicated to coverage of the Cardano ecosystem and projects developed on its blockchain.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal has wide-ranging implications. This might have a significant impact on how people consume articles about Cardano in today's age of digital journalism. It's fascinating to even consider the possibility of 24-hour TV offering continuous information, news, and updates regarding Cardano. The necessity for a platform with access to that information is now more crucial than ever because of the rising need for immediate and updated information. This solution does a fantastic job of capturing the requirements of the challenge, such as expanding the outreach and increasing Cardano adoption. Additionally, the author has strategies in place to reduce any hazards that were discovered during the preliminary background investigation. Influencers, YouTubers, and content portals seem to have taken care of the marketing components and will undoubtedly reach many consumers right away.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer presents a concrete proposal for how the team intends to accomplish its objectives for the community. The proposal includes a monthly plan as well as the short-term objectives that the proposer hopes to accomplish along the road. The team is brilliantly introduced, and the variety of individuals who make up the group have undoubtedly worked in the industry before. The team is also aware of the potential challenges they may encounter and briefly mentions potential methods to solve them. The campaign brief's ranges are appropriate and the proposed amount of 49k falls within them. The idea is more realistic and transparent thanks to the budget breakdown of the same. The existence of the Cardanofeed website as an ancillary to support the youtube channel gives more credibility to the proposal and adds to the overall weightage. The expertise of the team and the impact the product could have are clearly on the positive side for the community and the world in general.
f6_assessments.q2: To strengthen the great concept and the accompanying strategy that truly astounded me. The team's plan to solve challenges is taken into account when defining the KPIs. All of the indicators are in line with the campaign's needs and are undoubtedly appropriate to track their advancement. The community can have confidence in the team because they have participated in past rounds with a number of proposals and have had some of their initiatives financed successfully. Results like the number of views, subscriptions, and website visits are unmistakable signs that the plan was successful and accepted. Coming from a team who has worked alongside Cardano Feed, there lies very little doubt regarding the feasibility of successful implementation and hence the audit of the progress should be unchallenging and productive. And also with metrics to monitor the proposal post-release being specified by the author himself, it should also follow a similar trend. Hence, I score full marks for this intriguing idea that comes with such explicit detailing in every section.

f6_assessments.q0: Currently, the demand for information search is increasing, especially in companies and businesses, requiring a suitable, fast and effective method of information transmission. This proposal provides the Cardano community a powerful corporate digital TV project (only video, no audio support), with extremely rich content: Cardano News Feed, Coin quotes, Events Coming, Influencers,... . Therefore, it has effectively solved the challenge posed. Bring a great value to the community.
f6_assessments.q1:
Information about the team has been provided in full, the team includes video producers, advertising specialists, marketers,... . They are people with enough experience, knowledge and skills to carry out this project. In addition, they have achieved success in implementing the Cardanofeed.com platform, which is a relatively influential media platform (over 1 million monthly visits). This proves your team is fully capable to carry out this project. Links to LinkedIn profiles are also provided, adding transparency to the above information.
Detailed roadmap (4 months) has been provided. The to-do list is quite exhaustive. Having a detailed roadmap makes budgeting so much easier. You have calculated a budget for each very specific job (based on the number of months worked and the salary for each month). However, it would be even better to break down your budget further (e.g. calculation based on hours worked, hourly rate, etc.). This will contribute to transparency for the budget, adding more confidence to everyone in this project. Indicators to evaluate the progress and success of the project are also provided specifically. This will be the yardstick, making it easier for everyone to track the project.
f6_assessments.q2:
After reviewing all the information you provide (suggestions, videos,...). I feel that the information provided is quite complete, completely enough to judge the success or failure of the project. I also appreciate that you have identified the risks, challenges and ways to mitigate it. Besides, I think the public launch of the online channel through running ads on social networking platforms such as facebook, telegram,... will also contribute to minimizing the risks and challenges encountered.
This is a project with a very good idea, besides the information provided is relatively clear. I believe this project will be done successfully. If so, it will bring great value to the community, making it possible for everyone to gain knowledge about cardano and blockchain. Thanks for a helpful suggestion!

f6_assessments.q0:
Cardano and it's ecosystem is growing everyday with projects focused on solving real life challenges, these makes it an adoptable system for any category and class of people (technical, non technical, farmers, students, enterpreneurs etc) but the public reach and awareness is lacking for the supposed target population due to so many limiting factors.
The proposer seek to bridge the gap by providing a visual infrastructure in form of a digital TV. These however will provide tools and resources for projects to provide realtime information, news and personalized contents solely about Cardano and it's ecosystem. These will eventually create a hub for all things cardano (Learning, exposure and overall, help folks stay in loop of all happenings in the ecosystem).
f6_assessments.q1:
The team is presented in detail with expertise relevant to the proposed idea, team is also behind one of the largest Cardano news explorer (Cardanofeed), the timelines and roadmap presented in these proposal is properly structured with a clear implementation plan which seems realistic. However, the proposer mentioned that the TV setup will be "Video only no audio" and that i think is a setback for the solution. Visuals without sound will not effectively convey the message unless the project is targeted for only people already familiar with cryptocurrency. The team need to reconsider that decision. Also if the TV is realtime and needs data connectivity, that also is a limitation to reaching some remote minorities and entrants. I hope to see the team balance the solution to also be accessed without internet connection (Maybe a collaboration with regular national TV channels to have a daily episode for Cardano). Otherwise, i think the team is capable of executing the idea.
The budget is fair and reasonable with a satisfactory breakdown of expenditure.
f6_assessments.q2: Currently,  we are presented with a great news outlet (Cardanofeed.com) by the team and they plan to continue updating progress through the platform. The timeline and roadmap is well structured to ease auditability and provides clarity. KPIs like number of contents produced, real time generated information etc are identified as unique factors to evaluate success and i agree that works.

f6_assessments.q0: This issue is well defined this is the place to follow news and video content in a DIGITAL ONLINE format. This problem is consistent with the current challenge. With a 24-hour schedule, dedicated to the coverage of the Cardano ecosystem, projects developed on this proposed blockchain can scale the challenge. It helps more people know about Cardano/Catalyst. A well-defined solution that provides the Cardano community, with a powerful enterprise digital TV project, with all devices, tools, program schedules, real-time news, and content personalized for 24 hours ONLINE TV on Youtube. This solution can solve the problem of the challenge. The author also mentioned the main risks affecting the development of the proposal that they can share the 24h channel link on youtube to users, but they are afraid that a large amount of traffic will not be enough to meet the capacity for them.
f6_assessments.q1: Timeline to implement this project in the span of 4 months. The author details what the to-dos for the month are and also aims to achieve them within a certain period of time. The proponent provided a complete blueprint with clear timelines. The progress of the project is also easily trackable through the web links that the author has listed. The success is clearly described by the author as: the amount of content produced, the information generated in real time for the users of the website, the amount of shares on social networks, the number of shares on specialized media websites. This success is linked first to the challenge of the campaigns. The solution to this problem is that the project author will work with pioneering software in online content management services and customized solutions - 100% over the Internet, video only & no audio, broadcast on YouTube. These solutions can address the current challenge of the team.
f6_assessments.q2:
KPIs are clearly defined, the proposed future implementation plan is very detailed and complete. Performance indicators are complete and clear.
Authors will provide the community with some kind of progress report as they go along, in the form of a monthly news release on the Cardano Feed, to measure the progress of their proposal.
The author will also provide a board to be disseminated in the Cardano Feed, with the development of the project according to the Catalyst KPIs.
Number of views on live youtube: 30,000
Number of Youtube channel subscriptions: 7,500
Number of messages sent: 10,000
Streaming hours: 700h+/month
With the above indicators show that this is a good project with adequate performance evaluation and measurement indicators.
Our team consists of developers, UX/UI, Marketing, SEO, Marketing, Business. The team consists of 4 main members working on this project the author seems very experienced and has a strong background: Otávio Lima is Founder & CEO at Cardano Feed, Flávio Lima is an Advertising Specialist , video producer and art and animation director, Gino Matos is a Crypto Journalist and content editor, Lucas Fernandes is a marketing assistant. The author also outlines what each member of the team does. did, they talked about their previous experiences. They also link attached network links so we can easily follow their projects easily. The funding for this proposal is $49,600 less than 20% of the full challenge budget. The budget is divided into reasonable expenditures, the author lists in detail and clearly for each item. I find it easy to measure the success of this proposal by the number of surnames the author has listed.

f6_assessments.q0:
I warmly welcome this proposed idea. Not only does it meet the challenge requirement. It is solving a problem of many people interested in Cardano, who need a program that summarizes all the news or content of the meetings. They usually have an own job  Due to the time difference, some Cardano meetings take place at 1am in my area. It's great how easy it is to see Cardano's news updates, and even better if it has audio.
The proponent clearly presented the content and technology background of the TV. I have no comment on this part of the proposal, the information provided I think is satisfactory.
f6_assessments.q1: Thank you for providing a full roadmap with actual timelines. And the information of the members is provided clearly enough to my satisfaction. The evidence of their experience is also very complete, the members are all experienced in the related fields. So I think the project has a great opportunity to execute and the workload in the roadmap can be taken care of by the project's human resources. I couldn't ask for anything more, in terms of budget, the requested funds were appropriate to the scope of the project and fairly easy to understand how it was used.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer showed how the community can track project progress reports and surveys via Cardanofeed. This shows that the project is willing to disclose the work information to those interested in the project. The KPIs you give are reasonable, it will help me compare with future surveys to measure the success of the project.

solution: Provide the Cardano community, a powerful Corporate Digital TV project, with all the equipment, tools, programming schedule, real-time news and personalized content for a 24-hour ONLINE TV on Youtube.
experience: Our team is composed of developers, UX / UI, Marketing, SEO, Marketing, Business and we developed the largest media coverage platform Cardanofeed.com, with more than 1,000,000 monthly visits and also the largest "Cardano Ecosystem" project directory (approximately 800+ projects).
